name: Martian Stranded
description:
Martian Stranded is a short horror game set on Mars. You must repair, remove and refuel your shuttle pod so that you can escape and get home. Be quick though, something is approaching.

This game is somewhat dependent on you being able to hear sound effects clearly, you may want to adjust the games audio level with your OS's audio mixer.

My YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCfRViaOiP-eo6pzjFZa4Tyg
